general.descriptionTextModule: This is the front page, containing statistics and system information

welcome.text: Discover the new Shopware generation. We look
welcome.subText: forward to your feedback! Our transparent roadmap will
welcome.subSubText: keep you up to date on the latest developments.

migration.description: Discover the possibilities of Shopware with real data. Together we will connect the systems. After that you can migrate your data with help of the migration assistant.
